FAQ

Questions?

What's the difference between this and free AI news?

Curation and community. We don't just aggregate ‚Äî we filter. 500+ members discussing, testing, and sharing what actually works. Plus the connections you'll make are worth the price alone.

How is this different from the 2021-2025 version?

Same community, sharper focus. We've always been about discovering digital tech. Now we're doubling down on AI ‚Äî the most important technology of our lifetime. Same members, new mission.

What happens after I join?

You get immediate Discord access. Introduce yourself, browse the resource library, and jump into the daily discussions. Weekly calls start next Monday.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes. Monthly plans cancel anytime. Annual plans can be refunded prorated within 30 days. No questions asked.

Is there a free trial?

No. We've found serious members create a better community. If it's not for you, cancel within 30 days for a full refund.
